column5: If any of you have not heard, fishing legend Ron Linder passed away this week. Ron and Al revolutionized fishing. Not only with In-Fisherman magazine, but they were also some of the first people to focus on the science and tactics of fishing. Why do fish respond to this, and why do fish move in this way.
Yes he will be missed. I learned a lot from reading the magazine and watching their shows and videos. RIP! www.targetwalleye.com has a good tribute for Ron.
